website_summaries.verdict: This is the ultimate alarm clock for young kids, with every feature you could want as a parent.
pros: Features five different light colors – blue for bedtime, yellow for wake time, cyan for nap time, green for fun time, and red for thinking time
Plays bedtime stories, lullabies, wake music, and white noise
Face plates are changeable and more are available for purchase separately
cons: Some buyers said they had glitches with the display after a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Wish the plug didnt break so easily
customer_reviews.text: I think this clock is amazing. It is a great set up, has great stories etc. BUT over the course of 3 years I've bought this clock 6 times. The plug easily breaks and batteries only power it for a week. Every time, it was the plug. I finally will have the conversation about a different clock with my kids. Therefore until the design for the plug is changed , I cannot purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Loving Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Faulty plug leads to malfunction. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I never ever write reviews, but felt compelled with this one. So many good reviews- seemed like the right product for our kids. After about 5 months of use, the charger / plug malfunctioned and it wouldn’t keep the right time, kept resetting due to the improper power it was getting. If the thing got even slightly bumped or moved by my kids (it was on their nightstand) it would lose power for a second and then turn back on, with the times all wrong. At 2am, the wake up alarm sounded and my sleeping kids were torn from their sleep Bc this thing couldn’t keep the time. Faulty transformer/ plug and it needs to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: Marc K

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Have had this clock for 9 months. It’s supposed to run on both electricity and batteries. Mine stopped running off electricity after 3 months, and i hav has to replace the batteries AT LEAST ten times. For what it costs, it should last longer than 3 months before having to start using batteries, and then those batteries should last longer than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Tot Clock
customer_reviews.text: First I went hi-tech with a Bluetooth light in my kids room, with a sound machine, and a white noise generator. Crazy still with scheduling the Blue-tooth light on and off times, I still struggled with my kids getting on a normal sleep routine. The Tot Clock has been great! When the night night story comes on they know they need to listen to the clock in order to get their stars (I have 4 year olds). Amazingly the now also stay in bed in the morning until the Tot clock tells them they can get up. It's been super helpful in maintaining a normal sleep habit for my 4 year old twins.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Man

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little appalled at how expensive this clock is, but I can testify it is worth every penny! Sanity is worth it. My 20 month old daughter was taking one 45 min nap a day and was obviously not getting the rest she needed. I got this clock, made a HUGE deal about the lights changing colors, and a week later she is taking 1.5-3 hr naps! She totally gets the concept and is really excited to see the light change colors. It even helps her go to sleep without a fuss. Now if only there was an app so I could sneakily change the awake time if it suits me... ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter sleeps with this everynight!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this clock. She loves listening to it in the morning and at night. The songs it plays are really nice and enjoyable. This was one of the best buys I have made for her! One negative though and I think the one we got is defected and hopefully is not the case for all of them- whenever we take it off the charger, the display goes in and out and eventually goes blank. We have replaced the batteries several times and we leave it on the charger. I will be exchanging it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now if you have bedtime problems with a tot!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, its the first thing that has made bedtime possible without screaming when we leave the room. Im not a fan of the music but my daughter is so that's great. We are a week or so into the wakeup function and that is going much better as well. Daughter is 2 so it does require a basic understanding but it's great! Love the clock face and everything really, I thought the functions looked confusing but they are not. Love it will buy again for little sister when she is old enough!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Freniere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product to help toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We first got this clock when my daughter turned 1 to help her know bedtime and morning time and naps... The lights are a wonderful feature. After a few weeks she learned to wait until her clock turned yellow before she would call to get up! Know with my second child I have delayed a bit in getting one but He just turned 2 and we are excited to introduce this to him! Such a great idea and clock to help them learn when it is ok to get up! We recommend to any and all who have kids! Especially toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Loved it BUT then it BROKE :(
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I loved this clock!! Not only does it let kids know when to sleep and wake up but it plays music! We loved the music! It also reads your child a bed time story. It was awesome! But then it broke!! :( Out of no where!! One day it was working, then one day it wasn't!! It really broke my heart because this clock is not cheap!! It was a stretch for me to spend that much on a clock and then to have it break is LESS THAN A YEAR, really made me sad...
customer_reviews.author: Jp86

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a toddler must!
customer_reviews.text: Why doesn't every toddler parent have this? My son is just shy of 2.5 and catches on quickly to the colors. I love all the settings and how week and wknd can be different. The timeout tike is awesome and due to the small size it is portable to where we put him in timeout. It really is a genius product and caters perfectly to parents (ie doesn't forget about naps, hidden controls and doesn't make us resent it constantly. Set the settings and you're done) AND kiddo (ie easy to understand, kid soiled) which I was having problems with when researching other
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoSun

customer_reviews.title: White noise doesn't actually last all night
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who decided it was a good idea to have the white noise turn off after 12 hours. My toddler tends to sleep from about 7:30pm to 8am. Well, thanks to this clock, he's been consistently waking up when the white noise turns off at 7:15am. I have it set to "all", which is supposed to last all night, but apparently someone's idea of all night is 12 hours. I even tried setting the nap duration as long as possible (12:59) and using that instead, and it still turns off at 12 hours. I'll be returning this, because it's worse than having nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but doesn’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Clock stopped working after a year and a half. We used it every day. Great idea but too expensive for it to stop working. I’ve never had an alarm clock just die before. If you buy it, I suggest Amazon’s extended warranty so you won’t be buying another clock on year 2. Edit: I contacted the manufacturer and they saved the day! They were kind enough to send me a new adapter even and my clock is working again! I was pretty upset and missed that clock for a few days. So it's definitely become an important staple in my home. Thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: CM75

customer_reviews.title: Finally controlled my kids till it broke
customer_reviews.text: Edited: just over a year of having it, one of my clocks just stopped working. Won’t work on batteries or plug, so something is clearly broken. For the price of these, I should not have a broken one after only a year. I love my TotClock! My kids finally stay in their rooms like their supposed to! My only complaint is that the nap time won’t go longer than 1:59! I’d love a longer nap time setting!
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! We have been having trouble getting my 2 year old to sleep in her crib at night. She would cry and cry. Now she looks forward to bed time and know that we have a few minutes to rock before the clock turns blue and her "story" comes on. I am able to put her in her crib without any tears. She listens to the story and the songs until she falls asleep. It's amazing! I highly recommend it and am already looking into getting a second one for my 7 month old. I just wish that there were more stories you could buy for the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright blue lights are pretty much the worst thing for sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I realize a lot of people like this clock, and I can understand. The features all work as described. Two problems though: One, the digital readout is so small that it's almost impossible to see in the dark. More importantly though, it's reeeally bright. Even at the lowest setting! Seriously, you could land aircraft with this thing. Also, having blue as the default night setting just isn't a good idea, since blue light stimulates the brain to wake up and can make sleep difficult. As a result the clock actually kept my son awake and we had to switch to his old clock. Really disappointing in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Judoka

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for time management for your child
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat item. The controls are a bit intimidating at first, but once you get a handle on them, they are a breeze. We use all of the settings, from the red timeout, to the green encouragement button when our child wants to play “for five minutes” before the dreaded bedtime. Anymore, kids cannot tell time on an analog clock, so this clock also provides those teachable moments. I would suggest this for any parent. I also bought one of the cartridge packs, and while it was nice to be able to change the music, I don’t think I would buy additional ones, as I now have 3 cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L

customer_reviews.title: Great (while it lasts)
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves listening to the music and stories. It makes bed time easier....while it lasts. It’s important for buyers to know this product will eventually stop working. I’m on my second and days after the return window realized the power adapter no longer works. It runs on batteries (for now) but last time it eventually drained batteries in a short period of time and stopped working. The first clock was a gift. After it broke I knowingly bought a second despite the risk because my daughter loved it and there’s nothing quite like it on the market. Had I to do over again I wouldn’t have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Does what we need, but could be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: This clock has been amazing for keeping our three year old from declaring it’s morning at 3am everyday! My little guy doesn’t take naps anymore, but still has Quiet Time, so I wish there was an additional color instead of two tones of blue. He sees both as night indicators and fights QT, so I’ll be trying to use one of the other two manual options instead. Haven’t tried the sounds or “treasure” yet.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had phone connectivity
customer_reviews.text: A great little clock. I only wish it auto updated for daylight savings and that there was a way to connect to it from your phone and, for example, turn the clock yellow (daytime) manually rather than always having to wait until the set time. Sometimes my 22 month old is up a lot earlier and I wish I could change it to yellow and just get him up, while still reinforcing that mommy comes in only when the color changes from blue.
customer_reviews.author: Tmac

customer_reviews.title: Great for encouraging bedtime routine
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock for my 3 year old (turning 4) to help with his bedtime routine. This clock has been amazing. He gets excited for the different color changes and immediately does what he's supposed to do. When we were in the middle of a game and it turned blue for bedtime, I told him he could have a few more minutes for us to finish. He told me no because his clock was blue and that meant it was time to get in bed. It has made our bedtime routine so much easier with less stress and tears.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product and when it arrived it seemed perfect. But Im glad I tested it before putting it in my child's room. The back cord did not fit correctly and after a few hours it caused the clock to flash on and off several times. Each time the clock would require a reset. Customer service was a joke. The representative implied I should have used 2 sources of power simultaneously for it to work properly. Thats completely unreasonable. So I returned the clock and ordered a different brand clock for a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful at bedtime, a little wobbly in the adapter department (my first one went out after about 3 months, luckily I bought the optional insurance. Little confusing to set up at first but luckily you can just start using it without needing to set anything up right away. I do wish the 'off' wasn't just simply touching the button though... my little one figured that out in about .01 seconds... anyway it's a wonderful little device and highly recommend (do buy the insurance if your planning on having it anywhere near your toddler though).
customer_reviews.author: Sardic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The first night we had it, we were testing it out in the living room to see how it was going to work before we put it in our daughters room... When it turned blue and started telling the story she looked at the clock and then looked at us and goes "That clock is telling us to calm down". The clock didn't actually say that but obviously it has some sort of hypnotic stuff (for lack of a better term right now) going on. It has a lot of different functions and override mode for when bedtime needs to start earlier/later than it's set for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Finally sleeping until 6:30!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this clock because our 2.5 yr old daughter was waking at 5am screaming for us to come get her. After weeks of this, we were exhausted. She’s generally a rule follower so we thought we’d give this a go. It has been a game changer in our house. On the mornings where she still wakes up early, she stays in her crib and plays. But we’ve had multiple morning now where she has slept past 6:30 - which has almost never happened! We’re hopeful this will also keep her in her room when she moves to a big girl bed. I highly suggest giving this clock a go if you have an early waking child.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Watts

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This clock is a lifesaver. When my daughter was 2 she went through a transition of waking up at 0500. It was SO early we tried everything. We then bought this clock and explained it to her and she took to it right away. Now every morning she tells "yellow time, time to wake up mommy and daddy." When I forget to turn on the blue nap light she always calls me in to remind me to turn it on. This clock has done wonders for sleep in our family!
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention Ever!
customer_reviews.text: When our son went into a big boy bed we were worried about him crawling out and waking out other child. Had the clock a few days before the transition; we were able to teach out son the colors and stay in bed. We use all the clocks features. Love the green button, we use it for listening the first time and he can get a reward. We love this clock, I plan on getting one for our nephew as well. Super glad we bought this! It is nice and portable, able to grab it and go with batteries to Grandma and Grandpa's house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina / Jared Schwiner

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my oldest a few years ago and it has worked out so well that I purchased it again for my younger kids. It really helped with my son's understanding of when it was ok to wake up in the morning. It is very convenient that it has built-in white noise and a battery back up. It's small enough that we bring it on vacations and he takes it with him when he sleeps over at family member's houses. Overall, I have not seen any other product that has all of the features this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Curious Little Clock
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock for our 3.5 yo and right now she's curious with how it works. She hasn't quite grasped the concept of the colors and how long each one represents - instead she stares at the "nap" light blue color which we call "quiet time" and then she eventually falls asleep right when quiet time is over! Ah! We will see how she reacts to the other color lights as time goes on. Wish this clock was more modern and simple than colorful like other ones (but they dont have all the options like this one), but it's more for her than for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I'm sad to say that this did not do the trick ...
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate for anything that would help keep my 3.5 year old in his room at night, and I'm sad to say that this did not do the trick -- which is not the clocks fault! It's a cool little clock, and he feels like a big boy having his own alarm clock in his room, but I wasn't impressed with the stories/music, and the volume is WAY too loud for falling asleep to.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: My toddler now stays in bed
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for about a year with our now 3 year old. He is such an early riser and we struggled with him staying in bed once we transitioned him to a big boy bed. Well, the first morning with this we offered a reward for staying in bed until the clock is yellow. And here we are a year later and his normal is he stays in bed until the clock is yellow. BEST thing ever! Lol. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: We had used a different "ok to wake" device for our oldest, but our youngest really like to have music to go to sleep to. This filled that gap. Setup was easy, although it definitely helps to read the instructions beforehand, as there are several options that aren't immediately obvious. Clock functions properly, lights turn colors when they are supposed to. My only complaint would be that the volume for the music does not get soft enough, although we live in rural Montana where ambient noise is minimal, so that may be more noticeable for us than it would be for others. I would recommend this over similar items in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning after first year
customer_reviews.text: Update: Got a new charging cord after the first year and it worked okay for almost exactly another year. Now I need to find another charging cord. Pretty frustrating. The idea behind the clock is good and it worked well for a year, but now the plug isn’t working and it keeps shutting off and occasionally turning back on. Pretty frustrating for an expensive toddler clock. Hoping it’s just the charging cord and that it can be replaced. I don’t like it enough to buy a new clock every year.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany K

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: We have this clock and it worked but then stopped changing colors after about 3 months. So that has put us in an even worse position than before. We are in the process of reaching out to the manufacturer for either a refund or replacement. We will update this review accordingly. If there is no update, than clearly the manufacture does not stand behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: heppy

customer_reviews.title: Great product if your toddler is willing to participate
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and great execution. My 2-year-old actually gets excited about it. That being said, it hasn't fully worked yet, but I attribute that to my toddler, her age, and her stubbornness - not the clock :) The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the colors are set. My daughter has requested pink and purple (which they don't have) and to use yellow for something other than wake time and I cannot switch them. I think this option would allow children to have some independence and decision-making power which may make them more excited about following what the colors mean.
customer_reviews.author: BDubs

customer_reviews.title: Great clock!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this clock for a couple of months now and my daughter loves it. She is so excited when I come in her room in the morning to get her. She always tells me that her clock turned yellow. It was also really nice because our power went out the other night and the clock stayed on so we didn't have to worry about her being scared in the middle of the night because it was dark in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R.

customer_reviews.title: Immediate success!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this clock for our 3 1/2 year old after many early risings likely a result of potty training. Our son was so excited to use this clock-and after great advice from a previous reviewer, we opened and programmed it then wrapped it back up as a gift! He immediately responded to it and repeated back the plan for the morning. And sure enough, he was up at his usual 6:00 waking, but watched the clock and patiently waited until it turned yellow! It is such a functional visual cue, since they have no clue what time it is when they wake. Just wish we had gotten it when he was younger. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Glennon

customer_reviews.title: I had an issue with my first clock where the yellow stopped working but customer service was great and exchanged it for a new on
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful in our bedtime routine helping our 2 &1/2 year old go to bed without a ton of protest. He looks forward to the story and song and knows that when the clock turns blue it's time to read that final book and go to bed. The "one more book" request is never ending and now the one more book has actually turned into just one and then he gets another one as the clock reads it's story. I had an issue with my first clock where the yellow stopped working but customer service was great and exchanged it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE our Tot clocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE, LOVE this clock! Got 2 for my twins. We set em up & started using right away since they were giving me a hard time getting up in the mornings. This clock has helped SO much! It's not me yelling at them to get up anymore. The clock is telling them that it's time to get up both visually w color changing, w sound changing from white noise to song. Setting up is easy. Easy to customize. To make it absolutely perfect I would love if there were different wake up times for each day of the week. Although they should have dropped naps now this clock encourages them (hallelujah) to nap or sit quietly in their rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbby

customer_reviews.title: Great, but very blue...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this clock has been helpful for my two-year-old. He likes the music and it's nice to have a timer for time-outs. My biggest complaint is, in his bedroom, even the dimmest setting lights up the whole room. I have it shutting off after an hour (it starts before our bedtime routine so it's on 10-15 minutes while he's in bed) but I'd love to leave it on longer so it's lit when he wakes up in the middle of the night. Instead we wait for the yellow light. He loves it though, and I feel like it was the best option for us.
customer_reviews.author: Susiee

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock, Just Don’t Teach the Tot the Buttons
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it! She asks for the clock every night and wants to know when her music is going to start. She also likes that it lights up at night and acts like a night light. What I don’t like though is she dropped it once, and the faceplate popped off, now she knows it comes off and she pushes the buttons. Also, I’m not sure that I’m the biggest fan of the colored buttons being in reach. She hasn’t figured out how to work them yet, but I’m sure when she does, she’ll be turning off the time out button on her own. Overall, I’m very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clock. I bought it for a 6 year old and it seems a bit young for her, but she needs one like this because the lights help her understand when it's time to get up, bedtime, etc. She can't tell time yet, so this helps. My only wish is that they had some music selections that weren't so 'young' but hey, it is targeted for toddlers. If they had a few cartridges with just classical or nature sounds it would extend the longevity of this clock even further. But it is great quality and we do really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this clock! It's worked magic for my (just turned) 2 year old. He was getting in the habit of waking up at 5:30AM and it was killing us. We explained the clock and he is now sleeping till 8AM every day (even though the clock turns "yellow" at 7...the clock gives him time to lay back down and go back to sleep if needed). Highly recommend this product and just bought my second one for my baby girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!!!! Works well and plays a happy song to wake up
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Wish I had it sooner. The clock gives the 5 year old his own means of waking up for school (I am already up and watching his cuteness). If he is a bit tired, he complains about the clock and not me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Clock was pretty easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Clock was pretty easy to setup, and our 3 y/o was excited to have something to let her know when it was OK to wake us up. The last thing you need to start the day off with is an argument with your toddler about when is breakfast time! We explained the color schemes and what they represent and she was able to grasp the concept. The bedtime song/story is a little too elementary and won't replace our book reading/noise machine but its nice that the clock is fully customizable to either turn those features on or off. Not sure if the item is worth its full purchase price but not much out there in this product space.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Thank you tot clock!
customer_reviews.text: This has (so far) solved one of our biggest issues -- getting our daughter into bed without a fight. She's still waking up earlier than we'd hoped but I'll take early wake ups over screaming and crying to sleep. We've only had it just under a week but she loves to hope in bed and listen to the stories and songs. I suspect we'll be buying all of the stories!!
customer_reviews.author: J.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler hands!
customer_reviews.text: Great clock for littles. I love being able to correlate the yellow of the "day" clock with the yellow glow of the sun coming in his window in the morning. This clock is the perfect size for toddler hands and my 3 year old loves to carry it around the house and put it in bed with him at night. It is very easy to program and use. It's a big thumbs up for us!
customer_reviews.author: Fsugirly

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity if you value your sleep
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our tot clock!! This is the 2nd one we've bought (we have 4 kids). It makes bedtime and nap time a breeze because we just tell them to look at the clock, if it's blue you stay in your rooms and when it turns yellow you can come out. We get to sleep until 7am each day without a hassle from the kids. Also makes time-change so much easier. My only complaint is I've had to replace the cord 3 times, it gets really finicky where it turns off if it is barely touched which is annoying. But, other than that, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Great empowerment tool for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Gives great structure to our toddler who can’t tell time yet. The white noise feature and different options for sleep, nap, quite time are really nice. When she comes out in the morning proudly stating “Tick Tock is yellow!” She seems so proud of herself and empowered.
customer_reviews.author: Cantaloupe

customer_reviews.title: Loads of settings & options!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute clock! My 4 year old loves it and is very proud to have her very own clock. I search a lot for a clock because I wanted one that wasn't only digital. All the buttons are behind the faceplate and it is fairly easy to follow (even with a child hovering!) I'm only using the battery so let's see how long it lasts but so far so good! I like all the setting options and I will certainly be purchasing additional treasures in the future to switch up the story time and music. Love the versatility!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My (almost) 3 yr old daughter LOVES this clock! When she wakes up in the morning she waits with anticipation for the clock to turn yellow at 7am before she gets out of bed. This has saved us because before we bought this clock she was waking up at 5:30 in the morning, and getting out of bed. Now if she wakes up at 5:30, she sees that the clock is still blue and she rolls over and goes back to bed. It's amaaaaaazing. She has also started learning how to tell time because she is so into this dang clock. Now she is begging for a new faceplate.
customer_reviews.author: Lyger14

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for helping my toddler know when bedtime is and staying on schedule with out being able to tell time. Love all the different customization options for all the different times of the day, also the different timers for time out, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Borcutt

customer_reviews.title: screen burned out within 6 weeks and can't see anything.  Clock is now expensive garbage
customer_reviews.text: I owned an original and now two of these "New and Improved" versions. The original lasted more than 5 years before it broke in a fall. This one didn't last at all. It has not been abused, but the screen is burning out. It started turning the wrong colors at the wrong time and this morning it just looked orange.
customer_reviews.author: JuleNY

customer_reviews.title: Helps my 3 y/o
customer_reviews.text: Settings for so many things: weekend, weekdays, wake up, sleep time, nap, etc. it’s great for my 3 y/o toddler. It has taught him to stay in his room until the music goes off in the mornings, rather than him coming into my/husband bed too early!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, high-quality product. My son just turned four and is very interested in learning about time. The clock has a nice countdown feature during time-out and nap time which help him understand the duration of a second, minute, and hour. He especially enjoys when the clock changes color indicating it's wake time and he can come downstairs. The sound quality isn't the greatest, even at the lowest volume it sounds scratchy, but that's not important for our purposes. It is great, however, that we can plug it in instead of constantly changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We have utilized this clock to the fullest. I can't believe all of the wonderful features this clock has! My daughter can't go to sleep without it. She asks me to turn it on before bed and she doesn't get up, whine or cry anymore. We absolutely love it. Can't wait to buy more cartridges and get more variety of what this clock has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Corgi123

customer_reviews.title: This clock is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is amazing!!! We have it now in both my girls rooms. We have it set for blue to be on all night long, so they know if they wake up at night and its still on they can't get out of bed. When yellow turns on, its ok for them to get out of bed. The built in other times are awesome as well. They girls loved listening to the story at the beginning and then the singing. I highly recommend this alarm clock to any parent who has toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: This clock is very helpful for my 3 year old learning to read both digital and analog time. She is also learning to take more responsibility in her sleep and wake schedule by understanding blue means time for sleep and yellow means time to wake up. She especially looks forward to hearing the song that can be set as an “alarm” and serves as extra motivation to stay in her room until she hears it in the morning. The only negative is the price which is a little more than I wanted to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Munsell

customer_reviews.title: I loved this clock when we first bought it (May 2017)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this clock when we first bought it (May 2017). I took this with us when traveling to provide a consistent theme for bedtime, which included using the blue light and white noise features. Now the clock will only work when plugged in! I've tried changing the batteries, which I know work. The clock will flash blue for a minute and then completely shut off. Maybe something is loose inside? I don't know. Again, I recommend this clock but it may not last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock
customer_reviews.text: Likes - super cute, easy to program, came with adapter My toddler recognizes the color changing face and knows when it's time for bed and when it's time to get out of bed - my main reason for purchasing this clock. We honestly haven't used the bedtime stories, lullabies, wake music, or white noise features, but it's nice that those features are available on this clock. Dislikes - pretty expensive for a clock for a toddler
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This clock is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second clock we have ordered. Our two older children (ages 7 and 5) still follow the colors for getting up and going to bed. This clock was a life saver for them and really helped them understand the difference between morning and a reasonable time to wake up. They didn't get understand why they couldn't get up when the sun was up so this clock showed them what a true morning time was. I have used the green light as reading time for my oldest child at night. I have used the red for time outs. Kids are very visual so the colors have helped so much. This clock is worth every penny spent
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my sanity! My kids are early risers, and even my stubborn 3-year-old son understands and obeys this thing. You need to have a positive reward system in place for the first week to make sure they are willing to follow the rules, but it does work. My daughter is a creature of habit and likes being able to listen to the same story each night as she goes to sleep. I like being able to dim the light, change the volume, and set up different times for weekday/weekend wake-ups.
customer_reviews.author: The Barker Circus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this clock. She know knows when it's time for bed and when it's okay to get up. She really enjoys the music and is singing all the words to rockabye baby. I love the options that also come along with this clock. You can set the amount of time for the music, whether or not you want the bedtime story and there's a energy saver for the light. I like that feature because blue lights aren't the best for sleep. If you want to your child to sleep through the night I highly recommend this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful problem solver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my granddaughter who was getting up too early at 6am. NOw she sleeps until 7:30am because she is waiting for the clock to turn from blue to yellow. She got up early before the yellow light only the first day, and my daughter told her to go back to bed until it turned yellow. Every day since, she has been waiting for the yellow light before she gets up. Needless to say, her mother loves the clock too (she can finally sleep longer too)!
customer_reviews.author: Jones Best Buys

customer_reviews.title: This clock is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my 21 month old when she suddenly started waking up much earlier than normal. While she is still a little young to grasp the "don't call out for mommy until clock turns yellow," she LOVES this clock. She knows that blue means night night and yellow means awake, and really looks forward to turning it blue for naps and bedtime. She also loves the music for falling asleep. This clock is easy to use, and the company responded very quickly when I contacted them with a question. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kebber03

customer_reviews.title: Toddler must-have
customer_reviews.text: Wanting to help your child develop some independence, routine, and self-help skills? This clock is WONDERFUL! It's effective and easy to use! It comes with a variety of settings so you can set your tot clock up to best fit the needs of your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Donahue

customer_reviews.title: My twin 5 year old kids were pretty excited to use this clock
customer_reviews.text: My twin 5 year old kids were pretty excited to use this clock. It is very helpful that it has both the face of the clock and a digital time to help them learn how to read time. I do wish that there was more variety in the music for the alarm and not just one song playing over and over. But my daughter gets it and says, "Well, it will just keep playing over and over until you get up and press the button, mommy!"
customer_reviews.author: Staten Island mom

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this clock
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this clock! I feel like it has definitely helped them know when it's time to get out of bed, but I should mention that my 4 year old figured out how to get the face plate off and mess with the parental controls on the FIRST NIGHT. So if you ever made a "version 3" of this, consider some kind of latch mechanism to keep the faceplate on.
customer_reviews.author: LD Smith

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was less expensive but it's certainly been worth it! We got one for my older son when he was 2.5 years old and it quickly solved our early morning wake-ups. We remind him when the clock is blue that it's time for bed, and that he may not call for us or come out of his room until his clock is yellow. On Prime Day we bought a second one many months ago for our younger son and just gave it to him for his 2nd birthday.
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Alaska!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is great for parents that all have the same schedule for weekdays and weekends. We have two kids, with different bedtimes and naptimes, and different wake times for different weekdays and weekend days. It'd be a pain to program, but helpful if it were like our home thermostat where there is an options for M-F, or M, T, W, H, F and weekend or Sa and Sun. That's the really nit-picky stuff. Overall I think it'll be really helpful, especially living in Alaska where it's dark until 1000 and gets dark again at 1600. The change in colors lets the kids know if this dark is when to get up or stay in bed!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Started working for my 3 year old after 2 days! My daughter used to sleep until 6:30 or 7 but about a month ago started waking up at 5! We bought this clock (& moved some toys into her room) to keep her in her room until 6:15. She didn't "get it" the first morning but did the second (& third and fourth!). She now waits until her clock "turns yellow" then comes and gets us to show us it's yellow. We aren't using all the features on it yet but well worth the money already!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for sleep training
customer_reviews.text: Tot Clock worked well to sleep train our toddler. Color changes to help toddler be aware of when they should be a sleep or taking a nap or when its time to get out of bed. Has a timeout and encouragement timer as well which comes in great to reinforce different behaviors. Overall great clock for its purpose. Sound quality could be a little better, the story telling nap time, sounds a little creepy, but would not really expect much else from a clock in regards to sound.
customer_reviews.author: David Chin Yee

customer_reviews.title: When my daughter turned three she suddenly hated her room
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter turned three she suddenly hated her room, bed, sleeping alone. She'd wake up multiple times each night and might finish the night somewhere other than her room. We got the clock to help her understand the routine and set expectations. She likes the recorded story and music. We keep the white noise on all night. She completely understands the concepts of the blue and yellow lights - she just chooses to ignore them! So we still are not successful at getting her to sleep through the night without crying and wanting someone with her.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J. H.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter, 2, suddenly was getting out of bed multiple times before going to sleep (around 10!) and would wake up and come into our room by 6 or 6:30 in the morning. We were all exhausted, so we ordered this clock, suggested by a friend, and she has only left her room after we put her to be on one night in the past month, and she's only come into our room before the "wake" time once. She knows "Blue means bed," and it works great at nap time, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Tot Clock is so great.
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 2.9yrs got this for Christmas. We started using this right away. He likes it. He tells me the colors of the clock. We only started it for daytime, naps and bed time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Gebbs

customer_reviews.title: We loved it. After years
customer_reviews.text: We were given the older model from family to use with our toddler. We loved it. After years, we needed a new one and ordered the new and improved. We love it even more! I like the size better (it's smaller), the face (less light shining), and the digital component to the clock. Our daughter who is 2.5 loves it. She's been in a "big girl" bed and still thinks she can't get out of bed until the clock turns yellow. I would recommend this to anyone who is trying to sleep train a toddler or transition a toddler to a "big kid" bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful clock for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This clock is fantastic! I love that it has both a digital display and regular clock face. This will be a real help when it's time to teach the grandkids how to tell time. I bought one for each grandchild and they both love it. It really helps to have them understand when it's time to get up from naps or in the morning. And, waking to music has made the mornings much more pleasant. My grandson wakes up and is excited to get the day started.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Holidays

customer_reviews.title: Encourages my daughter to sleep in a little later!
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars because it's effective. I'm getting about 30 minutes more sleep in the morning because the color coded clock face is easy enough for my 2 year old to understand. It doesn't get 5 stars because I think it's overpriced for what is actually a very simple product. Also, I put off programming it for a week because looking at the instructions and all the buttons made my head hurt. It reminds me (exactly) of programming a thermostat for daytime and nighttime, weekday and weekend settings. Once I actually did it, it didn't take that long, but I really think it could be much more intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Layne

customer_reviews.title: Great product for little ones
customer_reviews.text: The idea for the tot clock is great! We primarily use the night/bedtime feature as well as the morning/wake up feature. Our child has learned not to get out of bed in the morning until the clock lights up, which has been very helpful. The other features (e.g. time out clock, etc.) are a great addition as well, but are not quite as easy to use. The faceplate to cover the settings buttons is also a great idea so that the children cannot press the covered buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's a great concept but let's be straight about a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept but let's be straight about a couple of things: for $60 the audio quality should be much better. Right now it's not even AM radio quality. Also, the override buttons on the top are massively frustrating to employ. Sometimes they work, sometimes they don't. Some will override the others, but not visa versa. The programming controls are not exactly intuitive, but with a little time you can get the hang of it. Hopefully they can polish this up a bit because it is otherwise a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product but I wanted to teach my two year old son the concept of time. So the first night that it changed to blue was a life changer. He looked at it got super excited and walked himself to bed. I would like some improvements to be made but otherwise this is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tanel Helmik

customer_reviews.title: Great product if it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock has so many great features: wake, nap, night, encouragement (I used for potty training) and time out settings. My daughter is 2.5 and she just started coming out of her room way before it was time to wake up. It took her a little over a day to figure out and follow the clock. I loved this clock but now I'm a little scared because after having it for about 2 weeks it stopped working. So now we are on our second clock and fingers crossed this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, worth the extra
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying various ways to get our 3 year old to sleep and decided to give this clock a try after researching several different options. Initially, we were skeptical as it was priced a bit higher than others, but we are quite pleased so far and feel that the extra features are worth it. The clock is easy to use and very flexible. Our daughter really enjoys it and looks forward to the music and stories. We aren't all the way there yet with getting her comfortable in her new bed, but we are definitely on the right track with the help of this clock.
customer_reviews.author: TFM

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Better
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely helped to keep our almost 3 year old daughter in her room through the night. She was wandering into our room multiple times a night for months - it was exhausting. I saw this clock on a few blogs and decided to give it a shot. She still wakes up occasionally, but it has decreased since we started using this clock. It has only been a little over a week, so I am hopeful things get even better as time goes on. She gets really excited when the clock turns yellow and she can come wake us all up!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best clock until it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: This clock is the best thing for my 2.5 year old. He is a rule follower and stays in his room until it's time to wake up. Although we don't use the white noise, it is an awesome for travel. One less thing to bring right? No the bad. It broke after 1 year and 2 months. The clock turned red and stopped working. We ordered a replacement so we hope it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this clock is wayyyyyyy small more like for a childs toy
customer_reviews.text: this clock is wayyyyyyy small more like for a childs toy.. I have the original one and I loved it, I ordered a new one because of the digital and anolog time display.. It is totally small and I don't like it as much as the orginal tot clock which was bigger and better.. the only kool thing about it is the timers are hidden and the kids cant just mash buttons and change the time and such.. I was honestly expecting the same size clock just with the digital and anolog displays.. my son isn't very happy with it either he liked the bigger clock, he actually put them side by side and said "wow this is little"
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Working Already...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 1/2 year old who insisted on waking up at 5am and screaming until someone came and got him :) After just a few days he is already understanding that blue means we play in our room and yellow means we can ask for mommy nicely. This was exactly what we were looking for. The only thing I wish was a bit better was a brighter night light. The nightlight is dimmable but even the highest setting is not enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: L. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: It's easy for her to understand the day and night time ...
customer_reviews.text: We brought one for our eldest daughter (almost three) and she loves it. It's easy for her to understand the day and night time with the changing colours, so she understands when she can get up and when she needs to stay in bed and she loves the stories when it's nap time during the day. We ended up with two as our youngest daugther (18 months) then wanted one of her own. While is a little young to get understand the colours for day and night she loves it and the stories she hears
customer_reviews.author: G Philpott

customer_reviews.title: We have had this clock for just over a week and so far the boys love it. it comes with one catridge with stories ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two year old twins that hit a sleep regression. We have had this clock for just over a week and so far the boys love it. it comes with one catridge with stories and songs. Pros: Easy to set up with exception of the volume. Boys are sleeping again Cons: Does not have the ability to be hung on the wall. Volume, i think you may have to adjust the volume for each song, story, and sound (bedtime starts with stories, then songs, then white noise to sleep).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay N. OConnell

customer_reviews.title: And so far she is doing great remembering what the colors mean and paying attention to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves the clock! And so far she is doing great remembering what the colors mean and paying attention to them when she's in bed. I do wish the "wake up" color was green because she associates the color green with go, so it's somewhat confusing her. I love all the features of the clock, I just wish the blue light dimmed even more. My daughter has never slept with a night light, so even the lowest setting on this clock has been an issue for her. Other than that, it's working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old really likes this clock. We like it too except I wish the bedtime story was a bit longer. The size is great and the voice for the story and music is nice and soothing. The clock is easy to use and has helped our toddler stay in bed most of the night especially since she knows Santa gave it to her. The cost is a bit high but we’re hoping it lasts long enough for when our second child goes into a big bed. We haven’t yet used it for anything other than bedtime since we haven’t needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Diiorio

customer_reviews.title: No complaints; It probably does more than I use ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints; It probably does more than I use it for, but when it turns blue and the bedtime song starts, my 2.5 year old knows it's time for bed. He will even carry it to his bedroom for book time. I can't say "no more tears" because sometimes he is clearly mad that it's bedtime, but he doesn't tantrum and I don't have to tell him "its time"
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This clock has been a HUGE help getting my toddler to stay in bed and sleep. He has learned that if the clock is blue, it's time for bed and he needs to stay in bed and sleep until the face is yellow. The timeout function has also helped us with him as well. He knows he has to stay in timeout until the clock changes colors. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Peters Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes it. She takes “tick tock” everywhere. I just don’t like that we can’t play the stories and music at anytime we want to. Unless I’m doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver - well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2.5 years old and has been a beast of a sleeper since day 1. We call him a "sleep hater" and while he still hates the mention of sleep, he's sleeping through the night and waking up in the morning saying "yellow" not screaming or crying for mommy and daddy. The tot clock has saved our lives! I've even have blue and yellow pictures on my phone so we can use it when we are on the road, but the clock comes EVERYWHERE with us!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Baranck

customer_reviews.title: Working like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We love this clock, more importantly, my toddler LOVES this clock! She gets excited when the bedtime story comes on and can't wait to get to sleep so she can wake to the yellow light and fun song in the morning :) Even my older daughter wants to climb into bed with her to listen to the bed time story.... We were having problems with our toddler getting out of bed several times at night, and this clock has worked like a charm with her! I know every child is different, but we're thrilled this has worked for us! My other daughter wants her own now too... :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLOCK!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter got this from Christmas and LOVES it! She loves the wake up music and it makes it much easier to get her out of bed in the mornings. Love all the different settings and options! Weekday and Weekend wake up times, Bedtime, nap, timeout, and encouragement timers, bedtime stories, lullabies, white noise AND wake up music! Anything we would want this clock to do it does. Plus love that it has both digital and analog clock to help start teaching my daughter how to tell time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Becker

customer_reviews.title: It worked pretty well and we also use the music as a ...
customer_reviews.text: We used it to train my daughter to "sleep in" until 5:30. Every morning she stayed in bed until the light turned yellow she got a reward. It worked pretty well and we also use the music as a trigger to let her know that is is nap time. Two issues: 1 the quietest music setting is still pretty loud for sleep time, we had to muffle it 2 for the price they should have included extra music cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Rathone

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock, but more complicated to set than expected
customer_reviews.text: The clock is more complicated to set than I expected, but I like that it has so many different settings. The default bedtime "treasure" is obnoxious (but I also find most electronic toys to be obnoxious). Thankfully I figured out how to turn it off so we just have the light changing colors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Borgman

customer_reviews.title: Good design but lasted only 14 months
customer_reviews.text: My son has this clock since he was 3. And now understands her can only leave his room when his clock is yellow in the morning. Very useful that way. The clock can be a bit too bright when the room is pitch back. But very good design in general. However, with normal use, our clock has stopped working A year and 2 months. It’s not a cheap clock so I expect it to last more than a year. Hence only one star review
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: More Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely helped us get more sleep. Once my daughter understood the concept, it is keeping her quiet in her room longer and she gets very excited when the clock turns yellow and she can get up! I haven't used the sounds or stories, so can't comment on that, but it serves its purpose and gives us a little more sleep. My only objection is that the blue for "sleep time" is still a little bold/bright even on the dimmest setting and I wished the "wake time" was green.
customer_reviews.author: DR

product_meta.title: My Tot Clock Toddler Clock, White
feature_bullets: With 10 fantastic features, My Tot Clock is the premier toddler sleep clock and a must-have parenting tool for families with small children. No other toddler clock comes close!
Illuminates 5 colors to manage all important tot time: Blue for BedTime, Yellow for WakeTime, Cyan for NapTime, Green for FunTime, and Red for Thinking Time/Timeout.

Plays bedtime stories, lullabies, fun wake music, and even white noise! All sound features are configurable to create a routine that is just right for your family. Ships with the "It's Night Night Time" Tot Clock Treasure; Other Treasure sold separately.

Changeable Faceplates make My Tot Clock even more fun for tiny tots! Match My Tot Clock to your child's interests or bedroom theme! Ships with the Moon & Stars faceplate. Other fun faceplate designs sold separately, including Princess, Dora the Explorer, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and Dinosaur Train!
Other features include Energy-Saver, Weekend WakeTime, Night Light with 5 Levels of Illumination, Hidden Parent Controls, and Analog & Digital Clock Displays. This amazing clock has it all!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,453 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Manufacturer warranty for 1 year from manufactured date.
